column4: Hello, it is me again. I am actually representing a friend of mine with a support problem.

My friend just installed Ubuntu 7.10. Not just ten minutes ago, and though Ubuntu loads up, he is reporting that its not loading anything beyond the Ubuntu 'wait' icon, and I am assuming, the orange screen. Any ideas what his problem could be?
boot in recovery mode, and see where it halts
